abstract.p: Manufacturing system performance is dependent upon its design. Improvement in design can enhance system productivity. Effectiveness of design selection process can be greatly enhanced using a combined simulation-artificial intelligence approach. COMAND, a knowledge-based computer consultant for manufacturing system design, is described.
